title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Sedona, Arizona
content:
Photo submitted by Dave Anjos, “Not your typical ride in Sedona. The red rocks with a winter perspective. After a very dry spring, summer and fall the precipitation on the trails is welcome. Will make for some tacky dirt in a week.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Sedona, Arizona appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
